column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Old Fashioneds - at the time I went I had just "discovered" them.  I had 3
column2: which is probably unwise but they are still to date the best I've ever had.  Not to sweet
column4: warm and round and sweet and perfect. (Rye was my favorite). At the time
column5: I had a friend who was very into OF's
column6: and I kept telling him we had to go and throw down a few on me - sadly
